description:
gc: fix string comparisons for new bool rules

The two string comparison optimizations were
missing the implicit cast from ideal bool.

Fixes issue 3119.

messages.text:

gc: fix string comparisons for new bool rules

The two string comparison optimizations were
missing the implicit cast from ideal bool.

Fixes issue 3119.
